global_settings_title: one2Five Nandan Review App Global Config Settings
authentication_required_description: Enabling this will require reviews to be authenticated before being displayed on site.
sync_products_description: Enabling this allows products to sync to One2Five Servers.
text_case_description: Select text case for Button Font.
primary_color_description: This applies to all One2Five Plugin buttons.
accent_color_description: This applies to all ratings including stars and bars.
font_color_description: This applies to all One2Five Plugin buttons.
